DOC.brief_summary: This mixed methods study aims to answer the question: "What is the work of being a patient with type 2 diabetes mellitus?" .
DOC.brief_title: The Work of Being a Patient With Diabetes: Data Collection Via a Smartphone Application
DOC.detailed_description: This study will describe how much time persons with type 2 diabetes mellitus spend on health management and the burden they experience from these activities.
DOC.criteria: receiving medical care at Mayo Clinic endocrine subspecialty clinic diagnosis of type 2 diabetes unable to provide consent patients who reside in an extended care of intermediate care facility
